text: One Hour Photo is a 2002 American psychological thriller movie. It was written and directed by Mark Romanek. It starred Robin Williams. Fox Searchlight Pictures distributed the movie in the United States. One Hour Photo also starred Connie Nielsen, Michael Vartan, Gary Cole, and Eriq La Salle. Williams won a Saturn Award for Best Actor (2003) for his work in the movie. The movie received positive reviews, earning an 81% rating at Rotten Tomatoes. ==Cast== * Robin Williams as Seymour "Sy" Parrish * Michael Vartan as Will Yorkin * Connie Nielsen as Nina Yorkin * Dylan Smith as Jake Yorkin * Gary Cole as Bill Owens, Manager * Erin Daniels as Maya Burson * Eriq La Salle as Det. James Van Der Zee * Clark Gregg as Det. Paul Outerbridge * Paul H. Kim as Yoshi Araki ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * * Category:2002 thriller movies Category:2000s psychological movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies about families Category:Movies about revenge Category:Movies about photographers Category:Movies about security and surveillance Category:Movies about stalking Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:American independent movies Category:Movies set in department stores Category:Movies set in hotels
title: One Hour Photo
